data.prayer: Father, encourage the 18,560 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sankt Gallen, Switzerland

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Sankt Gallen, Switzerland.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,560 believers in the state of Sankt Gallen.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 18,560 believers in the state of Sankt Gallen the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Sankt Gallen, Switzerland. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Sankt Gallen access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary:
the state of Sankt Gallen, Switzerland has a population of 462,900.

We estimate Sankt Gallen has 18,560 people who might know Jesus, 333,876 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 110,464 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sankt Gallen, Switzerland.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
